entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
